message: Since its inception, the group has sponsored billboards, worked with the Clinton Police Department, organized and co-sponsored programs for the public, assisted trucking companies in educating drivers about how to spot trafficked persons, and visited a number of Clinton area public places to adhere stickers to bathroom mirrors with the message “National Human Trafficking Resource Center 1-888-373-7888.”

data.description: CLINTON — At one time in his life, retired truck drive Al Burke didn't know what to do for a girl in a situation she couldn't control.
data.title: Volunteers work to end human trafficking
